name: euro-4-cars-emissions-traded-on-uk-market-2000-2012
title: Euro 4 Cars Emissions Traded On UK Market 2000-2012
description: This dataset contains car emissions and estimated data about new cars (other than vans, 4x4s and pickups) available for sale in the UK market from EU Emission Standard Euro 4 from 2000 to 2012. The estimated data for emissions, consumption and cost of fuel are presented along with car identification data, as well as data on fuel type, engine capacity and transmission type.
documentation:
The source of data is UK Vehicle Certification Agency, of the United Kingdom Department for Transport and the United Kingdom's national approval authority for new road vehicles, agricultural tractors and off-road vehicles.

This dataset contains cleaned and organized data about the following car emissions: CO2, CO, hydrocarbons, oxides of nitrogen, particulate matter and external noise. In the same time it contains data about fuel and/or electricity consumption and the cost associated. According to UK Vehicle Certification Agency the majority of new Euro 4 cars traded on UK market, starting with each of the year of the period 2000-2012, are described in this dataset. The variables values are obtained from official tests, which are required before a model of car may be offered for sale. The values are listed for most new petrol and diesel cars on sale in the UK as well as for some cars powered by alternative fuels (Liquefied Petroleum Gas or Compressed Natural Gas). Values are also listed for some hybrid vehicles, which use both electric motors and internal combustion engines, and for pure electric cars.

The fuel related data are those published by the Department of Energy and Climate Change for March, and appear on the 'efficiency labels' that can be seen in car showrooms. The fuel cost is given for comparison purposes, for any given vehicle it will depend on the actual fuel consumption achieved and the price you pay for fuel. Because fuel cost was measured at 6000 or 12000 miles, to have a unique measure and keep the estimation as precise as possible the fuel cost estimated at 12000 miles was halved.

Missing data is represented in the dataset by 0 length string (empty cells). The raw data was collected in a controlled environment and represents estimates of above-mentioned pollutants levels. 

This dataset doesn't include data about vans, 4x4s or pickups.
other_titles: Euro 4 Cars By Manufacturer and Model Emissions
Cars Level Of Emissions in UK

fields.name: Years_Released
fields.description: The year UK Vehicle Certification Agency released the report about emissions from new cars traded on UK Market

fields.name: Car_Manufacturer
fields.description: The official car name manufacturer or importer

fields.name: Car_Model
fields.description: The official brand under which a car manufacturer or importer is selling a specific type of car

fields.name: Car_Description
fields.description: Specific characteristics of a car or cars belonging to a model sold by a car manufacturer or importer

fields.name: Car_Transmission_Type
fields.description: The abbreviate description for a car model transmission types or types

fields.name: Car_Engine_Capacity_In_Cubic_Centimeters
fields.description: A car model engine capacity or capacities in cubic centimeters(cc)

fields.name: Car_Fuel_Type
fields.description: The type of fuel or fuels a car model with specific characteristics is using

fields.name: Urban_Fuel_Consumption_In_Metric_Units
fields.description: The urban fuel consumption in liters per 100 kilometers, at an ambient temperature of 20-30 Celsius degrees

fields.name: Extra_Urban_Fuel_Consumption_In_Metric_Units
fields.description: The extra-urban fuel consumption in liters per 100 kilometers, at an ambient temperature of 20-30 Celsius degrees

fields.name: Combined_Fuel_Consumption_In_Metric_Units
fields.description: The urban and extra-urban combined fuel consumption in liters per 100 kilometers, at an ambient temperature of 20-30 Celsius degrees

fields.name: Urban_Fuel_Consumption_In_Imperial_Units
fields.description: The urban fuel consumption in miles per imperial gallon, at an ambient temperature of 20-30 Celsius degrees

fields.name: Extra_Urban_Fuel_Consumption_In_Imperial_Units
fields.description: The extra-urban fuel consumption in miles per imperial gallon, at an ambient temperature of 20-30 Celsius degrees

fields.name: Combined_Urban_Fuel_Consumption_In_Imperial_Units
fields.description: The urban and extra-urban combined fuel consumption in miles per imperial gallon, at an ambient temperature of 20-30 Celsius degrees

fields.name: Fuel_Cost_Per_6000_Miles
fields.description: The estimated fuel cost in pounds at 6,000 miles or halved from cost at 12,000 miles

fields.name: Level_Of_External_Noise_Emitted_In_Decibels
fields.description: The estimated level of external noise in decibels, measured on the A scale (so it is more closely represented what is heard by the human ear), emitted by a car model with specific characteristics

fields.name: CO2_Emissions_In_Grams_Per_Km
fields.description: The estimated level of CO2 emissions, in grams per kilometer, released by a car model with specific characteristics

fields.name: CO_Emmisions_In_Milligrams_Per_Km
fields.description: The estimated level of CO emissions, in milligrams per kilometer, released by a car model with specific characteristics

fields.name: THC_Emissions_In_Milligrams_Per_Km
fields.description: The estimated level of hydrocarbons emissions, in milligrams per kilometer, released by a car model with specific characteristics

fields.name: NOx_Emissions_In_Milligrams_Per_Km
fields.description: The estimated level of oxides of nitrogen (nitrogen dioxide - NO2 and nitric oxide - NO) emissions, in milligrams per kilometer, released by a car model with specific characteristics

fields.name: THC_And_NOx_Emissions_In_Milligrams_Per_Km
fields.description: The estimated cumulative level of hydrocarbons and oxides of nitrogen (nitrogen dioxide - NO2 and nitric oxide - NO) emissions, in milligrams per kilometer, released by a car model with specific characteristics

fields.name: Particulate_Matter_In_Milligrams_Per_Km
fields.description: The estimated level of particulate matter emissions, in milligrams per kilometer, released by a car model with specific characteristics
